 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּצַם‎</span>] **verb** ==split open== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***crack***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּצֵם‎</span> [[Jer.22.14|Jer 22:14]], ***cut out***, make, window); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix of earth, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּצַמְתָּ֑הּ‎</span> [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]] (subject God).
